mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, B.*, RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, WHDW.DPRTNAME NEW_WHBM, WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME NEW_WHR, to_char(to_date(B.XSRQ),'yyyy-mm-dd') NEW_XSRQ, (CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '无效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) NEW_ZT ,
(CASE WHEN B.is_yhxs = 0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_yhxs = 1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_YHXS ,
'巡检编号:'||B.xjbh || ' ' || (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION
FROM B_J_002_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.WHBMID WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from B_J_002_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj ) WHERE 2 >=RNO

SELECT B.*, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION ,WHDW.DPRTNAME NEW_WHBM, WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME NEW_WHR, REC.USERNAME||' '||REC.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, (CASE WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT ,
(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0101 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无剥落物' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有剥落物' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0102 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无剥落物' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有剥落物' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0103 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '标志清晰' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '部分模糊' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0104 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '道面清洁' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '部分模糊' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0105 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0201 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '平整' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '异常' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0301 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '正常' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '异常' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0302 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0401 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0501 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '完整' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '异常' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0601 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '是' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '否' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0701 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '是' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '否' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0801 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '正常' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '异常' END) END) NEW_XJXMBS,
(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0101 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-道面表面情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0102 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-嵌缝料情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0103 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-标志线、标识情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0104 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-污染物情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0105 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-FOD情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0201 THEN '土质地带-目视平整度' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0301 THEN '场内障碍物-已有障碍物标识和灯光' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0302 THEN '场内障碍物-疑似新增超高物' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0401 THEN '场外障碍物-疑似新增超高物' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0501 THEN '机场围界-目视完整度' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0601 THEN '排水渠-是否畅通' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0701 THEN '风向带-是否正常' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0801 THEN '灯光-目视有无损坏' END) NEW_XJXMBH,
(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD FROM B_J_00201_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_USER REC ON REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.WHBMID WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,WHDW.DPRTNAME NEW_WHBM, WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME NEW_WHR, REC.USERNAME||' '||REC.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, (CASE WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT ,
(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0101 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无剥落物' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有剥落物' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0102 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无剥落物' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有剥落物' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0103 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '标志清晰' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '部分模糊' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0104 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '道面清洁' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '部分模糊' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0105 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0201 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '平整' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '异常' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0301 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '正常' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '异常' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0302 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0401 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '无' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '有' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0501 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '完整' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '异常' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0601 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '是' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '否' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0701 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '是' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '否' END) WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0801 THEN(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBS=1 THEN '正常' WHEN B.XJXMBS=2 THEN '异常' END) END) NEW_XJXMBS,
(CASE WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0101 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-道面表面情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0102 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-嵌缝料情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0103 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-标志线、标识情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0104 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-污染物情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0105 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-FOD情况' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0201 THEN '土质地带-目视平整度' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0301 THEN '场内障碍物-已有障碍物标识和灯光' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0302 THEN '场内障碍物-疑似新增超高物' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0401 THEN '场外障碍物-疑似新增超高物' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0501 THEN '机场围界-目视完整度' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0601 THEN '排水渠-是否畅通' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0701 THEN '风向带-是否正常' WHEN B.XJXMBH = 0801 THEN '灯光-目视有无损坏' END) NEW_XJXMBH,
(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD FROM B_J_00201_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_USER REC ON REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.WHBMID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_J_002_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_J_002_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )

SELECT K.*,G.REC_IP,G.REC_CZSJ,WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME,
(CASE WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0101 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-道面表面情况' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0102 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-嵌缝料情况' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0103 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-标志线、标识情况' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0104 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-污染物情况' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0105 THEN '机坪、跑道和滑行道-FOD情况' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0201 THEN '土质地带-目视平整度' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0301 THEN '场内障碍物-已有障碍物标识和灯光' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0302 THEN '场内障碍物-疑似新增超高物' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0401 THEN '场外障碍物-疑似新增超高物' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0501 THEN '机场围界-目视完整度' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0601 THEN '排水渠-是否畅通' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0701 THEN '风向带-是否正常' WHEN K.NEW_XJXMBH = 0801 THEN '灯光-目视有无损坏' END) NEW_NEW_XJXMBH
FROM ( SELECT t.NEW_XJXMBH, wm_concat(REC_XGLX_TEXT||':'||WBWJM) NEW_WBWJM, wm_concat(REC_HD) REC_HD, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION FROM ( SELECT B.*, KCXX.XJXMBH NEW_XJXMBH, (CASE WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT,
F_GETREC_HD(B.REC_CZSM) REC_HD
FROM D_011_REC B
LEFT JOIN B_j_00201 KCXX ON KCXX.ID = B.MAINID WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )t GROUP BY t.NEW_XJXMBH
UNION ALL
SELECT t.NEW_XJXMBH, wm_concat(REC_XGLX_TEXT||':'||WBWJM) NEW_WBWJM, wm_concat(REC_HD) REC_HD,'LAST' DATA_VERSION FROM (
SELECT B.*, KCXX.XJXMBH NEW_XJXMBH, (CASE WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT,
F_GETREC_HD(B.REC_CZSM) REC_HD
FROM D_011_REC B
LEFT JOIN B_J_00201 KCXX ON KCXX.ID = B.MAINID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_J_002_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT MIN(C.REC_CZSJ) FROM B_J_002_REC C WHERE C.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )
)t GROUP BY t.NEW_XJXMBH ) K LEFT JOIN (SELECT G.* FROM B_J_00201_REC G WHERE G.REC_ZBID =#{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND G.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR})G ON G.XJXMBH=K.NEW_XJXMBH LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID =G.REC_CZRID
